data.Title: Microsoft Partners with StopNCII to Combat Non-Consensual Intimate Images on Bing
data.Description: Microsoft announced a partnership with StopNCII to proactively remove harmful intimate images and videos from Bing search results. This includes the use of digital hashes to identify and remove non-consensual content, including deepfakes.

data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update Completed
data.Description: The Google August 2024 core update has finished rolling out after 19 days. Initial observations suggest a mixed bag of results, with some sites seeing promising gains while others experienced significant ranking drops.

data.Title: SEO Tools Enhance AI Overview Tracking and Analysis
data.Description: SEO tools are incorporating features to track and analyze AI Overviews in search results. Semrush and SERanking are highlighted for their new capabilities, providing insights into opportunities, competitive challenges, and ranked page overlap.

data.Title: OpenAI's SearchGPT Faces Early User Feedback and Challenges
data.Description: Early users of OpenAI's SearchGPT have reported challenges with the AI-powered search tool, particularly in handling shopping and local queries.  There are also concerns about the potential for inaccurate or fabricated information.
